songs.title: Oggi fa troppo caldo e il mio cervello riposa
songs.translation: (today it's too hot and my brain rests)
songs.description:
It's too hot outside and this makes you lazy? I feel you.
This song was written while Bologna was burning and you can easily feel the July vibe.

songs.title: Underwater
songs.description:
What happens when it's scorching outside and you're too poor to afford air conditioning?
You simply stay underwater as much as you can.

songs.title: Sleeping on the couch
songs.description:
My room was too hot, the living room was fresher.
Apparently all my songs are about heat.

songs.title: Fiori elettrici
songs.description: Another track, more vibes, same suffering.

songs.title: Accessibilit√† continua
songs.description: Being constantly accessible can really drain your energies. Let's take a break.
